news.title: Trump trade rep sets low bar for China trade talks, no 'enormous breakthrough' expected
news.summary: Top officials from President Donald Trump's administration are set to meet in Sweden with their Chinese counterparts for economic talks. The talks are expected to take place over the next few days.

news.title: Trump says he's giving Russia less than two weeks to reach peace deal with Ukraine
news.summary: Trump said he is "disappointed" in Russian President Vladimir Putin over his continued military aggression in Ukraine. Trump said he was disappointed in Putin over Russia's "continued military aggression" in the Ukraine.

news.title: Quantum computing firm IonQ hires former JPMorgan Chase applied research head
news.summary: IonQ is one of the larger examples of pure-play quantum firms. Rigetti and D-Wave have seen their shares surge in the past year.

news.title: UnitedHealth aims to reassure investors as profits plunge, DOJ investigates its Medicare business
news.summary: Investors will be looking for a path to a turnaround from UnitedHealth's earnings release, after an abrupt CEO change and over 40% drop in the company's stock.

news.title: Elon Musk confirms Tesla has signed a $16.5 billion chip contract with Samsung Electronics
news.summary: Samsung Electronics shares opened 3.5% higher after the company disclosed the contract to supply semiconductors to a major global corporation. Samsung Electronics shares opening 3.4% higher.

news.title: S&P 500 now more likely to reach 7,200 next year, according to Morgan Stanley’s Wilson
news.summary: Better earnings and a steadily high multiple should boost stocks, says Morgan Stanley. Morgan Stanley: Stocks should continue to rise in the next few years.

news.title: How Opendoor’s meme-stock rally helped fix a listing-requirement problem, for now
news.summary: Opendoor wants more time “to assess market conditions and the Company’s stock price.” Opendoor: “I want to give the market time to assess the situation.’

news.title: ‘Vegas is not fun anymore’: $9 cups of coffee and pricier rooms are steering travelers away from the vacation mecca
news.summary: Local officials point to a decline in international travel as the key reason for a recent tourism slump. Las Vegas has become pricier by many measures.

news.title: The emerging-markets bandwagon rumbles on, and now China is climbing aboard
news.summary: Goldman Sachs looks for a continued broadening of the rally to incorporate China. Goldman Sachs: "We expect the market to continue to move in the direction of the Chinese economy"

news.title: ‘I have felt invisible, disrespected and heartbroken’: My firstborn son wants nothing to do with me. Do I cut him off?
news.summary: “My second wife and I agreed that 25% of our total estate would go to my older son, and the remainder to our younger son,” he said.
